post.body: uGGGGGGGH. I hate Tim Hortons. Want me to mail you some of their coffee?
but yes, you should be on goodreads.
Bed, shmed. Just jokin'. LOL
i shall tomorrow
hey are you on goodreads.com
Yes, I wish I was joking.
yeah. seems to be quiet now. The police have come and gone.
I can't wait for Ted Allen's new show!
Ok. Bills are paid. But now I'm broke. :( Good thing I have no life other than working, cuz i can't afford to do ANYTHING.
Two thumbs up to Creemore Springs Traditional Pilsner. Why oh why would you crap Budweiser or Coors Light when there is so much great beer?
Ok Food Network ENOUGH WITH THE DAMN MARATHONS ALREADY
Oops. Lunch break turned into into a three hour nap.
What I wouldn't give to have a nice big breakfast this morning...
Back at work. UGH
Dude, it's 1am and I'm still working from home. Fuck this noise, I'm watching me some food network and going to bed.
OK PEOPLE, if you want me to have this crap done, STOP SENDING ME EMAILS ASKING ME TO DO OTHER STUFF. FOR SHIZ. IM NOT DOING IT.
UGH. BURNING BURNING. MUST RESIST BURNING FOR LUSCIOUS BLONDE BANGS
uh oh. found some bleach, peroxide, hair dye and developer in my closet. FYI, I have no idea what I'm doing.
Dear Ex-Boyfriend, No, I will NOT have a threesome with you and your new girlfriend. I don't care if she's having erotic dreams about me.
http://twitpic.com/yyr8 - Frank teh kitteh is disapproving of Mama working from home!
